name: Executive MBA HSG
description: The Executive MBA HSG is a part-time general management program for experienced professionals who want to develop their management and leadership skills while continuing to work. The program combines academic rigor with practical relevance, focusing on strategic management, leadership, and innovation.
admission_requirements: At least 2-4 years of professional experience
schedules: Part-time format with modules every 4-6 weeks (Thursday to Saturday)
deadlines: Rolling admissions, applications should be submitted at least 3 months before the desired start date

name: International Executive MBA
description: The International Executive MBA is designed for experienced managers who want to expand their global perspective. The program includes modules in different international locations, providing insights into various business cultures and practices.
admission_requirements: At least 7 years of professional experience
schedules: Part-time format with international modules (1-2 weeks each)
deadlines: Applications should be submitted at least 4 months before the program start
location: St. Gallen (Switzerland), Singapore, New York, and other international locations
